sub_title: Technology and Privacy Advocaat Whitebridge Advocatuur. Computer Law Review International Correspondent The Netherlands. Jury Member Innovation Awards.
summary:
Experienced Technology, Sourcing and Privacy lawyer, holding Master Degrees in both Dutch and US Law. Partner at large law firms for almost eight years. Founder of Whitebridge Advocatuur. Awarded Chambers and Legal 500 rankings.

Correspondent The Netherlands - Computer Law Review International - A Journal of Information Law and Technology.

Whitebridge Advocatuur is the winner of the 2019 Award: Privacy Law Firm of the Year - The Netherlands - by Legal Comprehensive.
Anja is the winner of the 2018 Award Privacy Law - Lawyer of the Year - The Netherlands by Lawyer Monthly.
Whitebridge Advocatuur is the winner of the 2018 Award: Privacy Law Firm of the Year by Lawyer Monthly.
Whitebridge Advocatuur is the winner of the 2017 Award: IT and Communications Law Firm of the Year by Finance Monthly. 
Anja won the 2017 Women in Law Information Technology Lawyer of the Year the Netherlands Award. 

Member New York University Law School 30th Reunion Organizing Committee 2021.

Vice President Jury CIO Magazine Innovation Awards since 2019. 

Founding Member Jury Strategic Sourcing Awards 2010-2018.

Author CIO Magazine since 2019.
Author CDO Magazine (in 2018) about GDPR. 
Author (for approx. 7 years) Outsource Magazine about sourcing.

President New York University Alumni Association of the Netherlands.

Teacher at Legal Planet in 2019 and 2020 “GDPR Compliance at Law Firms”. Appreciated with 8,9 for substantive knowledge!

Teacher at Grotius Academie IT Law in 2002, 2004 and 2006.

Examiner at Grotius Academie IT Law in 2002.

Member of VIRA (Association IT Lawyers), NVVIR (Dutch Association Information Law) and NVAIR (Dutch Association Artificial Intelligence and Robotics Law).

Specialties: IT, Sourcing, Software IP Rights, Privacy and Personal Data Protection Law (GDPR) and Security and cloud law

www.whitebridge.nl

school.name: New York University School of Law

profile_positions.description:
mr drs Anja E. Dekhuijzen MCJ is an experienced IT, Privacy and Outsourcing lawyer in the Netherlands. She frequently advises clients on IT law, data protection, Outsourcing, IT contracts, cloud security. 

Anja holds three Master degrees: two from University of Amsterdam in both Dutch Law and Legal Public Administration; and Master of Comparative Jurisprudence from New York University School of Law. Anja has co-authored three books on outsourcing (2008), e-commerce (2001) and the millennium bug (1998). She has written over 150 articles and speaks on IT, outsourcing, security and cloud law and data protection.

See further: www.whitebridge.nl
